changes_short: Reworked buyback cost and assist gold system.

general.name: General
general.description: Esta versión se concentra en cambiar la manera en que las formulas de oro y resurrección funcionan.

general.name: General_3
general.description: Se ha cambiado el coste de resurrección de 100 + ( nivel * nivel * 1,5) + (tiempo * 0,25) a 100 + valor neto / 13

general.name: General_4
general.description: Resucitar ya no reduce el oro adquirido tras reaparecer

general.name: General_6
general.description: AoE gold for the losing team no longer scales with the overall team networth difference, just the individual networth of the dying hero. Previously, a core on your team doing really well meant that a support on your team dying gave an increasing amount of gold to the enemy.

general.name: General_8
general.description: -Ahora el componente de remontada es exactamente (valor neto del héroe que muere * 0,026 + 70) / n.º de asesinos

general.name: General_8_info
general.description:
This takes the place of the components below that considers NetWorth  
For example in the 1 killer case, it replaces (NetWorthEarlyFactor * 90 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375)
Like the previous formula, it is only given to the losing team

general.name: General_10
general.description: The gold multiplier based on the dying hero's net worth rank changed from 1.2/1.1/1.0/0.9/0.8 to 1.2/1.05/0.9/0.75/0.6

general.name: General_12
general.description: For reference, the previous AoE gold formula is listed below:

general.name: General_14
general.description: Términos:

general.name: General_16
general.description: Diferencia de valor neto = (Valor neto del equipo enemigo / Valor neto del equipo aliado) - 1 [con un mínimo de 0 y un máximo de 1]

general.name: General_17
general.description: Factor de valor neto = Diferencia de valor neto * Valor neto de la víctima

general.name: General_18
general.description: NetWorthEarlyFactor (for when Enemy has more NW) = ( EnemyTeamNetWorth - AlliedTeamNetWorth ) / 4000 [Has a max of 1]

general.name: General_19
general.description: NetWorthPoorFactor = 1.3 - 0.1 * NetWorthRank (dying's hero's networth rank)

general.name: General_20
general.description: NetWorthRankingFactor (hero's rank amongst allies involved in the kill): For 1/2/3/4/5 from poorest to richest are: { 1 } / { 1.3, 0.7 } / { 1.3, 1.0, 0.7 } / { 1.3, 1.1, 0.9, 0.7 } / { 1.3, 1.15, 1.0, 0.85, 0.7}

general.name: General_22
general.description: Fórmula:

general.name: General_24
general.description: 1 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 126 + 4.5 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 90 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375 )

general.name: General_25
general.description: 2 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 63 + 3.6 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 67.5 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375 )

general.name: General_26
general.description: 3 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 31.5 + 2.7 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 45 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375 )

general.name: General_27
general.description: 4 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 22.5 + 1.8 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 31.5 + NetWorthFactor * 0.027 )

general.name: General_28
general.description: 5 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 18 + 0.9 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 22.5 + NetWorthFactor * 0.02025 )

general.name: General
general.description: Los próximos parches se centrarán principalmente en ajustes de equilibrio como parte de los preparativos para The International. Hay planeados algunos parches quincenales más; los principales están programados alrededor del último Major y las clasificatorias de TI. Después de TI, creemos que durante la primera mitad de la nueva temporada los periodos entre actualizaciones serán más largos.

general.name: General
general.description: Added new Scepter upgrades for all of the 24 remaining heroes without an upgrade

general.name: General_2
general.description: Updated various older Scepter upgrades

general.name: General_3
general.description: Scepter can now be consumed as a buff by purchasing a 2000 gold recipe upgrade. Scepter buffs do not grant secondary stat bonuses

general.name: General_4
general.description: Roshan now drops a consumable Scepter buff item. The third Roshan will randomly drop either a consumable Scepter item or a Refresher Shard. The fourth Roshan has both. You can select Roshan to see his inventory and find out what items will drop

general.name: General_5
general.description: Added a new visual effect under heroes that have a Scepter upgrade

general.name: General_7
general.description: Se ha añadido a Mars al modo capitán

general.name: General_8
general.description: Se ha añadido a Io al modo capitán

general.name: General_10
general.description: Deny XP granted to the enemy (the player being denied) increased from 35% to 40%

general.name: General_11
general.description: Death cost changed from 50 + NW/40 to NW/40

general.name: General_13
general.description: Killstreak XP bounty increased from 200->1250 to 400->1800

general.name: General_14
general.description: XP requirement to reach level 5/6 reduced from 600/620 to 580/600

general.name: General_15
general.description: XP required to reach level 19+ increased by 100 each level

general.name: General_16
general.description: Ranged creeps XP now increases by 8 per upgrade cycle (every 7.5 minutes)

general.name: General_18
general.description: Siege creeps base attack time increased from 2.7 to 3

general.name: General_19
general.description: Siege creeps now spawn two units at 35 minutes instead of 30 minutes

general.name: General_20
general.description: Siege creeps can no longer be dominated, enchanted or converted

general.name: General_22
general.description: Tier 3+ towers damage increased from 152 damage to 175

general.name: General_23
general.description: Tier 1 Tower Protection aura armor bonus increased from 2 to 3

general.name: General_24
general.description: Tier 2+ Tower Protection aura armor bonus increased from 4 to 5

general.name: General_25
general.description: Tier 2+ Towers now have a multishot attack when glyph is activated. Attacks up to two additional targets. Prioritizes the closest units.

general.name: General_27
general.description: Slightly adjusted Radiant safelane hard camp position and the terrain nearby

general.name: General_28
general.description: Reduced the chase duration of the hard camp neutrals on the radiant safelane area

general.name: General_29
general.description: Radiant middle tier 2 tower is now moved further to the left (no longer has vision over the big camp on the right)

general.name: General_30
general.description: Adjusted tree line to the right of the radiant middle tier 2 tower

general.name: General_31
general.description: The Radiant mid lane medium camp now has 2 layers of trees behind it

general.name: General_32
general.description: Adjusted various Dire neutral spawn boxes

general.name: General_34
general.description: Illusions can now lifesteal

general.name: General_35
general.description: Lifesteal now works against enemy illusions (calculated pre illusion amplifications)

general.name: General_37
general.description: The following items are no longer partially shareable: Ring of Regen, Ring of Tarrasque, Sage's Mask, Ring of Health, Void Stone, and Perseverance
